title: Eyes on the Road: A Review of Literature and an In-Car Study of Driving Whilst Navigating
text: Transportation Research Board > Blurbs > Eyes on the Road: A Review of Literature and an In-Car Study of Driving Whilst Navigating Text Size: | Share: Eyes on the Road: A Review of Literature and an In-Car Study of Driving Whilst Navigating http://www.racfoundation.org/assets/rac_foundation/content/downloadables/Eyes_on_the_road_Robbins_&_Jenkins_September_2015.pdf 173257 Eyes on the Road: A Review of Literature and an In-Car Study of Driving Whilst Navigating The Royal Automobile Club Foundation for Motoring in the United Kingdom has released a report that compares driver behavior while using smart glasses, smartphone-based satellite navigation, and verbal instructions.   9/30/2015
